title: Overboard
description: A spoiled, wealthy yacht owner is thrown overboard and becomes the target of revenge from his mistreated employee.

reviews.text: Kurt Russell's mullet is once again awesome. A really funny movie and you can easily tell the great chemistry that Russell and Goldie Hawn have.

Wonderful movie to watch on a rainy day curled up on the couch with a hot cup of coffee. The characters are hilarious! Goldie is fantastic as a b_ _ _ _ h. Curt is hilarious and very easy on the eyes. He is gorgeous. This movie is one of my family’s most beloved movies to quote from: “I’m happy. Everyone wants to be me”.“I just...ate a bug”.“If you have a baby, you won’t be the baby anymore”.“Andrew, are you going to bring me my lemon or do I have to squeeze it from my hat?’
